alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 21 at 3:16AM EST until January 23 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Washington, Southeast Aroostook, Central Penobscot, and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Penobscot
